item.title: Lorex 4K RG59 Power Accessory Cable, Video Cable for Security Camera Systems
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
Extend Security Camera Distance – This camera cable extends your reach of security cameras up to 100 feet Video and Power Coax Cable – 4K compatible CM rated for any Lorex branded 4K analog camera; up to 5MP resolution for non-Lorex cameras Tested and Certified for Analog HD and Analog – Works with any brand …

Lorex 4K RG59 Power Accessory Cable, Video Cable for Security Camera Systems Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• Extend Security Camera Distance – This camera cable extends your reach of security cameras up to 100 feet
  • Video and Power Coax Cable – 4K compatible CM rated for any Lorex branded 4K analog camera; up to 5MP resolution for non-Lorex cameras
  • Tested and Certified for Analog HD and Analog – Works with any brand Analog HD (CVI/TVI/AHD/MPX) or analog (CVBS) security camera
  • Use In or Along Walls – This UL/CM certified cables is ideal for running along or inside walls
  • Fire-Resistant Extension Cord – The cable jacket has passed a vertical burn test to certify flames will not travel down the cable
Note: Products with electrical plugs are designed for use in the US. Outlets and voltage differ internationally and this product may require an adapter or converter for use in your destination. Please check compatibility before purchasing.

item.title: Ring Solar Panel (1st Generation), 2.4W, Barrel Plug Connector

item.description:
Barrel plug connector works exclusively with Ring Spotlight Cam Battery and Stick Up Cam Battery (2nd and 3rd generations only). May be used with USB-C input Ring Cameras (Spotlight Cam Plus, Spotlight Cam Pro) with the Ring Barrel Plug to USB-C Adapter – *adapter sold separately. With just a few hours of direct sunlight every …

Ring Solar Panel (1st Generation), 2.4W, Barrel Plug Connector Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• Barrel plug connector works exclusively with Ring Spotlight Cam Battery and Stick Up Cam Battery (2nd and 3rd generations only).
  • May be used with USB-C input Ring Cameras (Spotlight Cam Plus, Spotlight Cam Pro) with the Ring Barrel Plug to USB-C Adapter – *adapter sold separately.
  • With just a few hours of direct sunlight every day, your Ring Camera will stay charged around the clock.
  • Power connection is 13 feet. Item dimensions is 7.75 x 5.50 x 0.50 inch.
  • Ring recommends at least 3-4 hours of direct sunlight, depending on your usage. Ability to recharge varies based on device settings, motion notifications and sun exposure in the area of placement.

item.title: Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
1080p HD video doorbell with enhanced features that let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone, tablet, or PC. An update from the original Ring Video Doorbell, enjoy improved motion detection, privacy zones and audio privacy, and crisper night vision. Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in …

Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• 1080p HD video doorbell with enhanced features that let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone, tablet, or PC.
  • An update from the original Ring Video Doorbell, enjoy improved motion detection, privacy zones and audio privacy, and crisper night vision.
  • Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in motion sensors.
  • Powered by the built-in rechargeable battery or connects to existing doorbell wires for constant power.
  • Easily setup by connecting your Ring Video Doorbell to wifi through the Ring app and mounting with the included tools.
  • With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 180 days, and share videos and photos.
  • Pair with select Alexa-enabled devices to enable announcements and two-way talk for convenient in-home monitoring. With a Ring Protect plan (subscription sold separately), Alexa can also make voice announcements and automatically show live video feed on an Echo Show, Fire TV, or Fire Tablet when your Ring doorbell detects a person or package.

item.title: eufy Security, eufyCam 2C 2-Cam Kit, Security Camera Outdoor, Wireless Home Security System
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
Picture Perfect Surveillance – Live-stream and record footage in crystal clear 1080p HD. The 135° diagonal field of view on your outdoor security camera allows you to see exactly what is happening in and around your home. Half-Year Security from 1 Charge – Avoid frequent trips to charge the battery and enjoy 180-day battery life …

eufy Security, eufyCam 2C 2-Cam Kit, Security Camera Outdoor, Wireless Home Security System Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• Picture Perfect Surveillance – Live-stream and record footage in crystal clear 1080p HD. The 135° diagonal field of view on your outdoor security camera allows you to see exactly what is happening in and around your home.
  • Half-Year Security from 1 Charge – Avoid frequent trips to charge the battery and enjoy 180-day battery life from just one charge.
  • Detailed Night Vision – View recordings or live footage in crisp clarity, even at night, for a clear view of who’s there.
  • The Alerts That Matter – Human detection technology enables your outdoor security camera to intelligently detect body shape and face pattern. Ensuring you are only alerted when a person, and not a stray cat, approaches.
  • Ready for Any Weather – With an IP67 weatherproof-rating, this outdoor security camera is built to withstand the elements.

item.title: Imou 360 Degree Wifi Security Camera, Up To 256Gb Sd Card Support,1080P FHD
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
1080P full HD 2 megapixel), 10m/33ft night vision and pan/tilt 360° monitoring provide seamless protection day and night. Smart Tracking automatically follows moving person. One tap on the Imou app to shut the camera for your privacy when necessary. Advanced AI technology filters annoying false alerts of moving non-human objectives like cats and dogs while …

Imou 360 Degree Wifi Security Camera, Up To 256Gb Sd Card Support,1080P FHD Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• 1080P full HD 2 megapixel), 10m/33ft night vision and pan/tilt 360° monitoring provide seamless protection day and night.
  • Smart Tracking automatically follows moving person. One tap on the Imou app to shut the camera for your privacy when necessary.
  • Advanced AI technology filters annoying false alerts of moving non-human objectives like cats and dogs while accurately sending instant alerts of intruders to your smartphone.
  • Set up configurable motion detection zone and built-in siren at your fingertips to drive intruders away. 2-way audio allows instant communication with your loved ones.
  • Sound Detection sends instant alerts to your smartphone when it detects baby crying, glass smashing or other abnormal sounds, keeping you aware of what’s going on at every corner of home.

item.title: EZVIZ C1C-B WiFi Security Camera, 12 Meters Night Vision
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
Full HD 1080p Video and 40ft Super Night Vision – Enjoy industry leading video clarity and super night vision up to 40ft. C1C will automatically switch to night vision mode when the lights go out so that you never miss a beat. Smart Motion Detection Zones & Notifications – Draw specific zones within your cameras …

EZVIZ C1C-B WiFi Security Camera, 12 Meters Night Vision Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• Full HD 1080p Video and 40ft Super Night Vision – Enjoy industry leading video clarity and super night vision up to 40ft. C1C will automatically switch to night vision mode when the lights go out so that you never miss a beat.
  • Smart Motion Detection Zones & Notifications – Draw specific zones within your cameras field of view where you would like to detect activity. When activity is detected, you will receive a notification in real-time.
  • Full Duplex Two-Way Audio – Communication made easy. Simply tap the microphone function in the EZVIZ app to activate simultaneous audio transmission to listen and speak as if you are in the same room.
  • Setup Anywhere – The compact size of the C1C blends in very well to any home decor. A magnet is also built-in to the base and can be easily mount to a metallic surface. A metal plate is also included.

item.title: Ezviz C6Tc, 1080P Wifi Smart Home Security Camera, Surveillance Camera With Motion Tracking, 360 Degree Rotating
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
SMART MOTION TRACKING AND NIGHT VISION – Track and record any moving objects seen in the room with smart motion sensor. 360° offers up to 33 feet of clear night vision, HD 1080p resolution, and a 92° wide angle lens which makes objects being tracked easily visible, even at night. MOTION ALERTS AND TWO WAY …

Ezviz C6Tc, 1080P Wifi Smart Home Security Camera, Surveillance Camera With Motion Tracking, 360 Degree Rotating Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• SMART MOTION TRACKING AND NIGHT VISION – Track and record any moving objects seen in the room with smart motion sensor. 360° offers up to 33 feet of clear night vision, HD 1080p resolution, and a 92° wide angle lens which makes objects being tracked easily visible, even at night.
  • MOTION ALERTS AND TWO WAY TALK – See and talk to pets and family with streaming video and two-way audio. Motion alerts let you know what’s going on at home while you work. WORK WITH ALEXA: This WiFi Camera ca
  • WORK WITH ALEXA: This WiFi Camera can now be controlled by Alexa through Echo Show. Simply ask her to show you the baby’s room, the backyard, or anywhere you have an EZVIZ camera. Stay tuned for new skills as our relationship with Alexa grows.
  • LOCAL STORAGE – Access your video content and history anytime. Highly suggest to use 128 GB (131,072MB) microSD card if you are looking to store one month of motion detection recording.
  • PANORAMIC 360° TOUCH VIEW NAVIGATION – Capture the entire room with responsive one-touch pan and tilt controls and digital zoom. The Unique panoramic touch navigation takes a 360° picture of the room, and allows you to view live video at the angle you want by a simple tap.

item.title: EZVIZ TY1 Security Camera Indoor WiFi Camera
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
【 360° Panorama View & 1080p】EZVIZ TY1 security IP camera designed as a pan-tilt WiFi camera with panoramic viewing angles, delivering a 360° horizontal field of view with smart tracking, offering expansive field-of-view coverage, so you don’t miss a thing. 【Smart Night Vision】 EZVIZ TY1 security camera with Enhanced Night Vision Smart IR, the intensity …

EZVIZ TY1 Security Camera Indoor WiFi Camera Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• 【 360° Panorama View & 1080p】EZVIZ TY1 security IP camera designed as a pan-tilt WiFi camera with panoramic viewing angles, delivering a 360° horizontal field of view with smart tracking, offering expansive field-of-view coverage, so you don’t miss a thing.
  • 【Smart Night Vision】 EZVIZ TY1 security camera with Enhanced Night Vision Smart IR, the intensity of the infrared LEDs automatically adjusts to prevent overexposure in night vision mode, so you get more details captured within 10m at night.
  • 【Accurate Motion Detection】With the Auto Motion Tracking, EZVIZ TY1 security camera will automatically move to track and follow any movement while delivering notification and video recording in real time.
  • 【Easy Installation】EZVIZ TY1 home camera comes with screw-in base mounts and supports image flipping, allowing for table or ceiling installation, you can instal the security indoor camera depending on your needs.
  • 【Two Way Talk】EZVIZ TY1 WiFi camera built in anti-noise filter for a clear two way Audio access to interactive with your family or dog timely when get the real-time notifications. You can easily and conveniently enjoy communication with your loved ones and deter unwelcome stranger, wherever you might be.

item.title: Imou Ip Smart Home Camera- Bullet 2C
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
*1080P Full HD＆Night Vision: 1080P full HD security camera provides crystal clear videos and recordings even in pitch darkness . Night vision distance up to 30m/98ft. The latest H.265 compression reduces network bandwidth and storage usage by 50% at the same video quality(256g can store about 14 days). Color night vision provides full-color video & …

Imou Ip Smart Home Camera- Bullet 2C Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• *1080P Full HD＆Night Vision: 1080P full HD security camera provides crystal clear videos and recordings even in pitch darkness . Night vision distance up to 30m/98ft. The latest H.265 compression reduces network bandwidth and storage usage by 50% at the same video quality(256g can store about 14 days). Color night vision provides full-color video & image even in the dark. Night vision distance up to 98ft
  • *IP67 WEATHERPROOF: This durable IP67 outdoor camera can withstand temperatures ranging from -22℉ to 140℉ and work in stormy, snowy, and bad weather conditions
  • *HUMAN DETECTION & Buil-in Microphone: Powerful image processing technology makes this smart camera accurately identify the moving human body, greatly eliminating false alarms caused by pets, insects and raindrops. And you can customize detection areas and sensitivity. With High quality microphone built into camera can pick up sounds clearly while monitoring
  • *Built-in WiFi hotspot : Supports soft AP mode, So you can stream the video, play recording even when there is no Internet connection.
  • *SAFE & OPTIONAL STORAGE: 100% comply with GDPR Data Protection Regulation to enhance your privacy protection. Only you and your authorized user have access to the images and videos stored on the Micro SD card (maximum 256GB), the Imou Cloud, or a network video recorder
